The test sets ubo10, ubo20, ubo50, and ubo100 were created by Klaus Neumann and
Christoph Schwindt (see Neumann, K., Schwindt, C.: Project scheduling with
inventory constraints. Mathematical Methods of Operations Research 56(3),
513â€“533 (2002) for your reference).

The test set ubo200 were created by Andreas Schutt and Peter J. Stuckey (see
Schutt, A., Stuckey, P.J.: Explaining Producer/Consumer Constraints.
International Conference on Principles and Practice of Constraint Programming -
CP 2016. LNCS, vol. 9892, pp. 438-454. Springer International Publishing (2016)
for your reference).
